name: My Free Farm 2
description: Are you ready for a very special challenge? Then get ready to discover My Free Farm 2! This simulation is a captivating blend of farm and tycoon game. Bring in the harvest, keep animals and expand your property. Download My Free Farm 2 now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
